input.sentences: the fourth is fun | but it is mainly for the kids anymore .
they play all day | but you know they are thinking about fireworks .
and they preoccupy themselves with stuff | but with that always in the back of their minds .
then finally darkness falls and it starts .
and they get to see what they have waited all day for .
output.sentences: Kids always have the most fun on the fourth of July.
The girl is thinking about the fun she will have while she plays and watches the fireworks.
We have to come up with various stuff to preoccupy their minds until the fireworks start.
As night time falls the fireworks start.
We waited all day to see the wonderful display of fireworks.
